item.title: Chicken & Peppers Stew
item.description: Chicken & Peppers Stew This is a recipe kidnapped and adapted from Tara Parks, my college roommate’s mom.

item.title: Chicken Broccoli Casserole
item.description: Chicken Broccoli Casserole This is a modified version of my mom’s recipe, and one of my favorite comfort foods.

item.title: Chicken Pot Pie
item.description: Chicken Pot Pie This is my mom’s recipe, apparently pulled from a boxed Pillsbury pie crust way back when.

item.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.description: Chocolate Chip Cookies This recipe comes from the mom of a childhood friend.

item.title: Dduk Guk (Rice Cake Soup)
item.description: Dduk Guk (Rice Cake Soup) This soup is traditionally eaten at the Lunar New Year, but is a tasty and hearty dish.

item.title: Gingersnaps
item.description: Gingersnaps This is a recipe from the mom of a childhood friend and one of my favorites.

item.title: Green Dip
item.description: Green Dip I created this dip on a whim for some guests and it was an immediate hint.

item.title: Homemade Granola
item.description: Homemade Granola This is a quick, stovetop granola that makes for a great quick breakfast.

item.title: Mango Salsa
item.description: Mango Salsa An excellent summery snack – serve in tortilla chip cups for a quick appetizer.

item.title: Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.description: Oatmeal Coconut Chocolate Chip Cookies A recipe I developed to best incorporate the features I like in cookies.

item.title: Quick Ratatouille
item.description: Quick Ratatouille A la the film, except faster. Ingredients 2 medium zucchini, thinly sliced 2 medium yellow squash, thinly sliced 1 medium eggplant, thinly sliced into half-disks 6 roma tomatoes, thinly sliced Italian seasoning 1 jar tomato basil pasta sauce olive oil Instructions Preheat oven to 400F.

item.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
item.description: Stuffed Bell Peppers A childhood favorite, from my mom’s recipe files.

item.title: Tuscan Bean Toast
item.description: Tuscan Bean Toast Modified and cross-compiled from an assortment of sources.
